description: Try our easy to follow Lemony Parm Prosciutto And Herb Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Lemony Parm Prosciutto And Herb Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 80g Mil Lel Shaved Parmesan (save 20g for serving)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta per packet instructions.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a large fry pan. Cook garlic and onion until translucent. Add the cr√®me fraiche and bring to a simmer. Add the cooked pasta, using a bit of the pasta water to moisten if needed.
Remove pan from the heat, add the shaved parmesan, herbs, lemon juice, zest and seasoning. Gently toss to coat pasta. Serve topped with the crumbled prosciutto and extra shaved parmesan.
